item.description: Jonathan, a BA member and Assistant Chaplain at the Harvard Humanist Chaplaincy at Harvard University, will be talking on the topic of: "Confessions of a Humanist Chaplain: Sex, Humanism, and How to Win the War Against Conservative Religion." JF writes: "I will talk about my pathway to Humanism, from my childhood in liberal, heavily Jewish NY, to my education at the most godless college in America, to my student career as the first Atheistic Humanist in Harvard Divinity School's history, to my (not so secret) plans to establish another prestigious Humanist Chaplaincy built on the Harvard Humanist model." This is an event organized by the Concord Humanists; it would be a courtesy to let their organizers know if you plan to attend: http://www.meetup.com....
item.name: Jonathan Figdor at the Concord Humanists
